attributes.action: Allow 16+17 Year Olds To Vote On EU Referendum results To Determine An Outcome.
attributes.background: Allow 16 and 17 year olds to vote on the EU referendum topic and use these results and add them the the 18+ results to determine a solid outcome. 75% or more young people voted to remain and they should be given a chance as its their future at stake. As its their future, they should also get a say.
